title: website: exclude line numbers when copying from source files
body:
by **Dmitry.Gudkov**: 
This bug is related to http://golang.org website

Code samples (e.g. http://golang.org/doc/articles/wiki/final.go) contain line numbers
which makes copy-pasting of the entire code or some part of it littered with line
numbers so additional effort is required to clean up code before compiling.

Ubuntu 12.10, Chrome 23.0.1271.97
